title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 32.6 - Access
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 32.6 - Access

State Regulations

At any time when a discharge has occurred or appears
imminent, the department and the Department of Environmental Conservation shall
be provided with access to any facility, major or otherwise, for the purposes
of taking all actions necessary for the prevention of a discharge, the cleanup
and removal of a discharge, and ascertaining of the source and cause of the
discharge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

32.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
